article.headline: Canisius 71, Marist 61 (OT)
article.story: BUFFALO, N.Y. (AP) -- Jon Popofski scored seven of his 11 points in overtime to lift Canisius to a 71-61 win over Marist Monday night. DeWitt Doss' turnaround jumper tied the game at 59-59 with 45.5 seconds left in regulation, but he missed a game-winning layup at the buzzer to force overtime. Doss finished with 15 points, while Kevin Downey led Canisius with 16 points. The Golden Griffins (8-13, 6-6 Metro Atlantic Athletic) opened with the game's first six points and were up by as many as 10 before taking a 35-27 lead at halftime. Marist shot just 10-of-31 from the field in the first half. But the Red Foxes (10-11, 7-5) opened the second half with an 8-3 spurt, taking the lead on Miles Orman's layup. Will Whittington fueled the comeback, scoring 17 of his 19 points in the second half. Shae McNamara added 12 points.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
